articles.content: In September 1985, the Soviet State Security Committee (KGB) informed other Warsaw Pact foreign intelligence agencies that it had launched a new, major disinformation campaign. We are carrying out a … [+19779 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine status: Stages of COVID-19 vaccine development in India - Times of India
articles.description: 30 different companies are trying to produce an Indian vaccine to fight against the pandemic at large. The WHO has given approval to atleast 7 of them.
